item.description: Location : The A3 northbound. Reason : Roadworks are planned. Status : Pending. Schedule : Expect disruption everyday between 21:00 and 06:00 from 17 January 2022 to 20 January 2022. Lanes Closed : All lanes will be closed.
item.title: A3 northbound connector at a minor junction between A333 and A283 near Milford (north) | Northbound | Road Works
